level_1: Podcasts share why talking well builds trust in teams.
They explain why asking questions is a strength, not weakness.
Episodes tell stories of devs solving problems by talking early.
They teach simple words work better than complex ones.
This helps students feel safe to speak in groups.
level_2: Podcasts guide how to give clear project updates.
They share how to write simple emails and chats.
Episodes show why listening is half of communication.
They cover how to share blockers without fear.
This helps freshers share status confidently.
level_3: Podcasts discuss handling feedback and conflicts calmly.
They share how to talk to seniors without fear.
Episodes teach explaining bugs and fixes clearly.
They guide how to handle cross-team discussions.
This reduces miscommunication in real projects.
level_4: Podcasts explain how seniors mentor juniors in team talks.
They discuss leading daily meetings and sprint demos.
Episodes show how to handle misunderstandings quickly.
They highlight building a healthy talk culture.
This builds trust and clear teamwork.
